channel.title: Health on /dev/ by Massimiliano Pippi
channel.description: Recent content in Health on /dev/ by Massimiliano Pippi

item.title: Notes on a Nervous Planet
item.description: First book I read from the author, I’m now curious to read the others. For being an essay the prose is a bit strange, some chapters are shorts, some longer, some seem aphorisms… But you get used to it pretty fast and you get more and more into the point of view of the author as you progress.
